title: 11.2 Master Challenge 3
question: An e-commerce platform collects extensive data on user browsing behavior and purchase history to deliver personalized product recommendations. As a programmer working on this platform, how would you ensure that personalized advertising practices respect user privacy and maintain transparency? How can you strike a balance between providing a personalized shopping experience and obtaining user consent for data collection?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
